graph_title: Social protection beneficiaries by type of institution and sex
indicator_name: Social protection beneficiaries by type of institution and sex
title: Untitled
national_indicator_description: Social welfare beneficiary is every person who has used certain forms and measures of social welfare and social work services, once or several times during the reference year. Beneficiaries are classified into two basic age groups – minor and adult beneficiaries. Social welfare institutions are institutions for children and adolescents without parental care, social welfare institutions for mentally and physically handicapped children, adolescents and adults, social welfare institutions for adult disabled persons and social welfare institutions for adult persons.
